original_title: 夜明けの夢が終わるとき
overview: Kanami Kashima, a newcomer to the workforce, has been severely tormented by repeated hard work, poor health, and discord in her relationships. Then one day, Kanami happens to meet her childhood friend, Ayato Akatsuki. Kanami is overcome with nostalgia as she reminisces with him.
title: 夜明けの夢が終わるとき
